channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Hyperion Financial Close Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Hyperion Financial Close Management

item.title: CVE-2020-2563|2024-08-04T07:09:54.558Z -- oracle%20corporation -- hyperion%20financial%20close%20management
item.description: Vulnerability in the Hyperion Financial Close Management product of Oracle Hyperion (component: Close Manager). The supported version that is affected is 11.1.2.4. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Hyperion Financial Close Management. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized creation, deletion or modification access to critical data or all Hyperion Financial Close Management accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 4.2 (Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:H/UI:R/S:U/C:N/I:H/A:N).

item.description: Vulnerability in the Hyperion Financial Close Management product of Oracle Hyperion (component: Close Manager). The supported version that is affected is 11.1.2.4. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Hyperion Financial Close Management. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized creation, deletion or modification access to critical data or all Hyperion Financial Close Management accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.2 (Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:H/UI:R/S:U/C:N/I:H/A:N).

item.title: CVE-2020-14541|2024-08-04T12:46:34.789Z -- oracle%20corporation -- hyperion%20financial%20close%20management
item.description: Vulnerability in the Hyperion Financial Close Management product of Oracle Hyperion (component: Close Manager). The supported version that is affected is 11.1.2.4. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Hyperion Financial Close Management. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Hyperion Financial Close Management accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 2.0 (Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:H/UI:R/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N).
